channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [BEAM-7510] test_write_to_different_file_types is flaky

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: More logs available in https://builds.apache.org/job/beam_PreCommit_Python_Commit/6788/consoleFull
Assigning to pabloem who recently added the test.
Sorry about that. I'll skip it and work on a fix.
